title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 26.2 - Certified audit and report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 26.2 - Certified audit and report

State Regulations

Each council or association shall submit a certified
financial audit and a narrative report of activity, having a form and content
satisfactory to the Regents or commissioner, within three months after the
close of each reporting period as described below. These reports shall be
provided annually. However, additional reports may be required by the Regents
or commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
26.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
